channel.title: Help adding white dye [PI]
channel.description: Source is Project Insanity uses itemdef2 to handle models I added colored whips to server new 474 anim and i want to add useitem for all dyes on whips to make the colored whips but there is no white dye and i know u can just recolor any of the dyes but i need the int's for that so could anyone please help i can teamview if that's what u need me to do.

item.title: Help adding white dye [PI]
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

Source is Project Insanity
uses itemdef2 to handle models
I added colored whips to server new 474 anim and i want to add useitem for all dyes on whips to make the colored whips but there is no white dye and i know u can just recolor any of the dyes but i need the int’s for that so could anyone please help i can teamview if that’s what u need me to do.
